welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eisenstadt, Austria! Known for its rich history and charming atmosphere, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Eisenstadt."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Fertoszentmiklos Meidl Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
